title: Crunch CEO Jim Rowley on Resurgence of Franchises
itunes:title: Crunch CEO Jim Rowley on Resurgence of Franchises
description:
Crunch CEO Jim Rowley discusses how gym franchises executed a remote pandemic plan and that members are now returning to physical locations.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
